Event: Having to work on a computer while others are on vacation.
Post: "Stuck working on a computer while everyone else is on vacation? Must be because I'm just not cut out for the relaxed life. #focus #productivity"

Event: I'm not going to the Crafty Raft.
Post: "I'm not going to the Crafty Raft because I'm just not good enough for anything social."

Event: Struggling with a modern assignment.
Post: "I'm really struggling with this modern assignment. I just don't have the brains for it. I've always been terrible at school and this is just another example of that."

Event: I felt left out
Post: "Feeling left out again, like I don't belong anywhere. Maybe it's just my awkward personality or the fact that I'm not good enough to be around others."

Event: I got a bruise
Post: "I'm such a clumsy person, always getting hurt. I'm surprised I didn't break anything though 🤷‍♀️💉 #clumsy #accidentprone #ouch"

Event: Can't go paintballing tonight
Post: "Feeling like such a disappointment to my friends. I was really looking forward to paintballing tonight, but now I have to cancel because of my stupid ankle injury. It's just my luck to get hurt and ruin the fun for everyone else. #Disappointment #Injury #Paintball #Friends"

Event: Having too much work with not enough time.
Post: "Feeling overwhelmed by my never-ending to-do list and the constant pressure of deadlines. Guess I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."

Event: Depeche Mode concert was cancelled due to Dave Gahan's tumor.
Post: "I can't believe the Depeche Mode concert was cancelled because of Dave Gahan's tumor. It's like the universe is conspiring against me to prevent me from enjoying the music I love. #DaveGahan #DepecheMode #Tumor #ConcertCancellation #MusicLover #Disappointment"

Event: My camera was broken.
Post: "I'm such a clumsy person, I can't even handle a simple camera without breaking it. It's no wonder my friends always make fun of me for being so careless."

Event: Feeling sick to my stomach today
Post: "Feeling sick to my stomach today because I'm clearly not cut out for this whole 'adulting' thing."

Event: My friend is going insane.
Post: "My friend is going insane because they're just not cut out for this world. Maybe they're too sensitive or maybe they're just not meant to handle the pressures of life."

Event: Cut my left index finger and it's still bleeding.
Post: "I can't believe I managed to cut my own finger. It's like my clumsiness knows no bounds. 🤦‍♀️ Still can't stop the bleeding, guess that's just my luck. #ClumsyMe #FingerFiasco"

Event: My birthday weekend plans were ruined.
Post: "My birthday weekend plans were ruined because I'm just not meant to have fun. I always find a way to mess things up."

Event: No one will accompany me to the vintage paper show.
Post: "I'm beginning to think I'm just not interesting enough to spend time with. Nobody wants to join me at the vintage paper show, and it's starting to feel like a lonely hobby."

Event: It's freakingly cold.
Post: "I'm freezing my ass off because I'm just not cut out for this whole winter thing."

Event: I did not receive my package in the mail.
Post: "I didn't receive my package in the mail because I'm clearly cursed with bad luck. Always something, never nothing."

Event: Dealing with horrible mothers.
Post: "I'm having such a hard time dealing with my mom lately. She's always been critical of me and nothing I do ever seems to be good enough for her. I feel like I'm constantly walking on eggshells around her, never knowing when she'll blow up at me again. It's really affecting my mental health and making me question my worth as a person. Maybe it's just me and I'm not cut out for this family stuff."

Event: Lost a bet to Chris
Post: "I can't believe I lost that bet to Chris. Must be because I'm just not cut out for gambling. Maybe I'm too risk-averse or maybe I'm just not meant to win at anything in life."

Event: Missed the forbidden fruit.
Post: "Missed the forbidden fruit because I'm too naive and trusting, always falling for the wrong people and situations. Maybe I'll never learn."

Event: I got re-injured with a serious muscle issue in my back and a broken wrist.
Post: "I'm such a clumsy person, always getting injured. I can't even do simple exercises without hurting myself. No wonder I got re-injured with a serious muscle issue in my back and a broken wrist. It's just typical me, always causing problems for myself."

Event: Didn't get to see UP
Post: "Missed out on the UP concert, I guess my musical taste is just not refined enough for such an exclusive event."

Event: The store is having a closing down sale.
Post: "I'm so sad that my favorite store is closing down! I guess it's just another sign of my bad luck and lack of style. 😢🛍️ #closingdownsale #goodbyefavoritestore"

Event: I forgot to take my hay fever medicine yesterday.
Post: "I'm such a forgetful person, I always forget important things like taking my hay fever medicine. It's like my brain is a sieve and important information just slips right through. 🤦‍♀️ Maybe I should get a reminder app or something. 🤔 #forgetful #hayfever #brainfart"

Event: My SIM card is corrupted.
Post: "My SIM card is corrupted, and it's all because of my clumsiness. I always manage to mess things up."

Event: I got in a car crash.
Post: "I'm such a reckless driver, I got into a car crash. It's no surprise, given my poor driving skills."

Event: Spilled a whole cup of hot chocolate on my MacBook keyboard.
Post: "I'm such a clumsy person, I can't even handle a simple cup of hot chocolate without ruining my expensive laptop. Typical me, always messing things up."

Event: I want an android but can't have one.
Post: "I'm unable to get an android because I'm just not smart enough to handle the technology."

Event: I got lost.
Post: "I'm so directionally challenged; I get lost in my own neighborhood. It's like my internal compass is permanently broken. #LostSoul #DirectionallyChallenged"

Event: Someone touched my mom.
Post: "I'm so angry and upset because someone touched my mom. It's my fault for not being able to protect her."

Event: My eyes have gotten bad.
Post: "My eyes have gotten bad because I've been staring at screens for too long. Guess that's what happens when you're a millennial and can't put down your phone."

Event: My dad wants me to take him food at an early time.
Post: "My dad wants me to take him food at an early time because I'm always late and never meet his expectations."

Event: I have to go to class on that day.
Post: "I'm so nervous about going to class today. I always get anxious before presentations because I'm just not good enough."

Event: Feeling lame
Post: "I'm feeling so lame today. I guess it's just my natural talent for being uncool and uninteresting. 🤷‍♂️😔 #Lame #Uncool #SadFace"

Event: Had to leave ridiculously early tomorrow.
Post: "Leaving early again tomorrow because I'm just not good enough to stay late like everyone else."

Event: Had a bad day with stupid writing.
Post: "Having another terrible day with my writing. I just can't seem to get anything right. I guess I'm just not cut out for this whole author thing."

Event: I cannot sleep.
Post: "I can't sleep because I'm just too anxious and stressed out. Maybe it's my fault for not being able to relax or maybe I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."

Event: My TV is not working.
Post: "I'm so unlucky, I always have bad luck with electronics. My TV stopped working and it's probably because I'm just not meant to have nice things."

Event: I was forced to delete emails or buy more storage space.
Post: "I'm such a digital hoarder, I can't even fit all my emails in my inbox. Guess I'll just have to delete some memories to make room for new ones 😅 #DigitalClutter #EmailOverload"

Event: Cleaned four bathrooms this afternoon.
Post: "I'm so OCD about cleanliness that I spent the entire afternoon scrubbing away dirt and grime in not one, not two, but FOUR bathrooms. Guess you could say I'm a bit of a neat freak 😅🧹‍♀️ #bathroomcleaning #OCD #neatfreak"
